lines.text: [last lines]
By the way... Same procedure as last year, Miss Sophie?
Same procedure as every year, James.

[hesitates]
Well, I'll do my very best!
[They rush up the stairs to the bedroom]
Must I, Miss Sophie?
James... please!
[at the end of the dinner]
I think I'll retire.
Are you going to bed? Sit down, Madam, I'll help you up!
Sugar in the morning!
Ooh, I'll kill that cat!

[as Mr Winterbottom, now affected by what he has drunk so far]
Here's to one of the nicest little women... *hic!*... one of the nicest little WOMEN!... that's ever breathed... ever breathed...
[James hesitates, then looks closely at Miss Sophie for a moment]

[after partly composing himself]
... ever breathed. I now declare this bazaar open, and so forth.
[James drinks Mr. Winterbottom's drink and belches loudly]

[impersonating Mr Pommeroy]
Happy New Year, Sophie dear!
[after having served the second round of drinks, the alcohol is starting to take effect on James]
Mr Winterbottom?

[somewhat slurring]
Well, here we are again old love, here's to me and thee...
[James goes to drink but stops suddenly]
By gum... you look younger than ever, love. Younger than ever!
[James cackles cheekily then downs Mr Winterbottom's drink]
Scholl!
